name: Search for mismatched file extensions
description: Checking the content of a file against its file extension to identify mismatches.
details: This results in a file path of an identified file, but also highlights the extension that the file has, and the file extension(s) that are expected
references: Basis Technology (2015), Extension Mismatch Detector Module, https://sleuthkit.org/autopsy/docs/user-docs/3.1/extension_mismatch_detector_page.html
